short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Archive and share your favorite web content

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Never loose access to the web content you love: totalRecall allows you to archive, auto-organize and share webpages. 

Stop using bookmarks. Use totalRecall !


FEATURES:
========

1. Archive Web Pages: Users can quickly archive web pages with just one click. This feature allows users to save a copy of a webpage for future reference.
2. Revision History: conveniently maintains a history of revisions for each archived web page and track changes made to a page over time.
3. Automatic Categorization and Tagging: archives are automatically assigned a category and a set of tags. Helps you with organizing your archives and makes it easier to retrieve specific pages based on their assigned metadata.
4. Sharing: Users can easily share their archived web pages with friends or colleagues. 
5. Context Menu Highlighting: Users can utilize the context menu's highlight function to emphasize important sections of archived web pages. When shared, recipients will be directed to these highlighted sections when navigating the shared link.
6. Lock/Unlock: make sure you don’t change content while sharing by locking/unlocking an archive.


REQUIREMENTS:
=============
All you need is a google account…

PRIVACY:
=======
Archives are stored on your google drive in a specific folder named “totalRecall”. Extension DOES NOT have access to any other folder. Metadata associated to archives are only visible to the totalRecall solution and cannot be seen by any other app accessing the google drive account.
